title: Starfire
description: A story of a young G-Marine who is facing a Board of Inquiry after attacking an Alliance Starship. The Captain is given an impossible mission, find out what happened to the AMS StarFire, the Alliances' newest and deadliest, war ship. The AMS StarFire has a crew of over 3,000 men. Captain Lombard is given 50 men and sent on his mission. Find out why he is now facing a Board of Inquiry over his actions.
author: Mike                 Lee
